cup_description: You will get 50% extra winning points when used at the end of the match.
full_cup_description: x2 your winning points when used at the end of the match.
hero_skill_not_lose_mana: +20% chance of not losing mana when placing bombs
info_ask_stake: Do you want to stake {0} BOMB from {1}?
info_cant_buy_heroes: You can not buy more than {0} heroes
info_cant_buy_houses: You can not buy more than {0} houses
info_claim_bcoin_confirm:
Do you want to claim {0}?
Fee: {1}
info_deposit_help:
1. Must have at least 5 BOMB on the wallet
2. Claim more than 1 BOMB
3. You can only claim BOMB deposit once a day (UTC).
info_login_warning: Logging in with an account and a password does not allow you to make in-game transactions.
info_lus_help:
1. ROI from 300% and hold 500 BOMB can start mining LUS.
2. Each user can mine up to 30 mLUS and 2 LUS NFT.
3. The mLUS/LUS NFT claim fee is 3 BOMB.
info_mspc_help:
1. Each user can mine up to 120 MSPc.
2. The MSPc claim fee is 3 SEN.
3. Total Tokens for this program is 500,000 MSPc.
info_need_active_house: You need to active a house to use this function
info_need_bigger_house: You need to buy bigger house
info_need_buy_hero: You need to buy a hero to use this function
info_need_buy_house: You need to buy a house to use this function
info_only_use_one_house: You can only use 1 house at a time. If you buy more, you can change to a new house. Old houses can still be reused or bought and sold on the marketplace.
info_policy_invalid_password: Invalid password. Check the policy again.
info_policy_invalid_username: Invalid username. Check the policy again.
info_policy_rule:
1. Username must only contain from 6 to 20 characters. Do not use special characters or duplicate with another username.
2. Password must only contain from 6 to 20 characters. Do not use spaces between characters.
info_rename:
1. Must only contains from 4 to 10 characters.
2. Can contains special characters and spaces.
3. Cannot be duplicate with other account name.
4. Cannot contains any derogatory or reference to public figures in any form of writing. Violate this term will resulted in you reverted back to your original id after manual revision.
info_reset_roi_help:
1. Only available for users with ROI from 200%.
2. The deposit is used to pay the Reset ROI fee. If Deposit runs out, Mined will be used instead.
info_server_not_response:
Server not response
Please try later.
info_server_overload: The server is overloaded, please try again after 10 seconds.
info_stake_help:
In-game Staking: Using 2 types of BOMB in the chest to stake (Reward and Deposit).

Stake profit will not be compounded.

Stake must be at least 200 BOMB. Multiple Stakes are allowed, all stakes are collected into a savings package.

When unstake, you will receive back the entire staked BOMB + profit in Deposit.

The unstake fee is 15% and will decrease 1% per day. In other words, if Stake 16 days, the withdrawal fee will be 0%.
info_upgrade_warning: When using a bomber hero as an upgrade material, you will lose that bomber hero once the upgrade is complete.
info_upgrade_warning_rare: You are using a {0} hero as an upgrade material, you will lose this hero after a successful upgrade.
info_wofm_help:
1. Total Tokens for this program is 4.500.000 WOFM
2. Each user can mine up to 100 WOFM per week
Claim rules:
1. Every week, users must play WOFM game at least 10 minutes
2. Eligible users can claim WOFM directly in game Bombcrypto
3. Unlimited numbers of minimum WOFM claims
4. The WOFM claim fee is 3 SEN.
shield_description:
Active gives the player a bomb shield for 8 seconds.
Limit once per game.
ui_are_you_sure: Are you sure to quit the game?
ui_buy_hero_help_1: If you don't see the hero after purchase, click the icon on the top menu to receive
ui_buy_hero_help_2: Follow the Instructions to get your hero back
ui_buy_hero_help_3:
Step 1: visit <color=#00FF00>https://report.bombcrypto.io/hero</color>
Step 2: connect to the wallet.
Step 3: click <color=#00FFFF>Claim BHERO</color> and confirm your wallet.
Step 4: click <color=#00FFFF>Receive BHERO</color> and confirm wallet.
Step 5: log in the game again and check at <color=#00FFFF>CHEST</color>.
ui_buy_house_help:
<size=25>1</size>. YOU CAN BUY <size=25>5</size> HOUSE BUT CAN ONLY USE <size=25>1</size> HOUSE AT A TIME
<size=25>2</size>. YOU CAN SELL HOUSES TO OTHER PLAYERS AFTER LAUNCHING THE MARKETPLACE
ui_claim_bcoin_help_1: Follow the Instructions to get your BOMB back
ui_claim_bcoin_help_2:
Step 1: visit <color=#00FF00>https://report.bombcrypto.io/</color>
Step 2: search by wallet address.
Step 3: Click on <color=#00FFFF>RETRY</color> with Transactions whose Status is failed to get BOMB back.
Step 4: Recheck your BOMB in wallet.
ui_claim_help: 1. You must have at least 40 BOMB to claim. 2. Must have at least 5 BOMB on the wallet to be able to Claim. 3. You can only claim BOMB once a day (UTC time). Claim under 60 BOMB pays 10% tax. Claim 60 to less than 80 BOMB pays 6% tax. Claim over 80 BOMB pays 3% tax.
ui_claim_sen_help: 1. You must have at least 40 SEN to claim. 2. Must have at least 5 SEN on the wallet to be able to Claim. Claim under 60 SEN pays 10% tax. Claim 60 to less than 80 SEN pays 6% tax. Claim over 80 SEN pays 3% tax.
ui_continue_warning:
You have not completed the current level. 
If you choose to surrender you will lose your key.
ui_reset_roi2: Only available for users with ROI from 200%
ui_reset_roi3: AFTER RESET YOUR REWARD WILL BE INCREASED
ui_story_require: Requires 15 heroes to join this mode
ui_unlock_pvp: PVP only unlocks when using web browser and wallet login
ui_upgrade_warning: This hero will be lost after a successful upgrade
ui_auto_mine_help:
Heroes automatically go Home or Rest then back to work.

Every users can use Auto Mine for free for 14 days.
After the free trial, you will be charge if you use Auto Mine.

Price of 2 Auto Mine packages:
7 Days = 10% of total tokens auto mined in the last 7 days (Minimum cost = 3 BOMB)
30 Days = 35% of total tokens mined in the last 7 days using (Minimum cost = 10 BOMB).
Use BOMB in Deposit and Reward.

You can buy a new package before 2 days it's going to end.


You will automatically reconnect if you login with username and password.

ui_info_buy_repair_shield: Are you sure you want to use {0} {1} to repair shield?

tut_dialog_point_hero: Let's get your heroes to go to work.
